newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CNB FIXES CROWN +3.13 PCT VS MARK/USD BASKET.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CNB FIXES CROWN +3.13 PCT VS MARK/USD BASKET.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 26.785 to the dollar after Friday's fixing at 26.553, and at 17.694 to the mark from 17.717.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +3.13 percent, after a deviation of +3.33 on Friday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +3.17.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
